website_summaries.verdict: Elegant rose gold PVD stainless steel case with a brown leather deployment strap.
pros: Accurate quartz movement and water resistant to a depth of 99 feet
cons: The included band was short for some users

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The band started falling apart within the first month. The straps burst and it started flaking. The dial to adjust the time came out completely. I used to get a lot of complements about its style when I was able to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but simple!
customer_reviews.text: Just a quality time piece that keeps perfect time! My main watch now!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Shonk

customer_reviews.title: Swiss watch at excellent price
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice watch for everyday or special occasion. The face is bigger then it appears which is what I wanted. The butterfly clasp can be a bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Lederman

customer_reviews.title: Simple and practical watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It has a large dial and the clasp as well as the leather band is very nice. It takes a few days to 'break in' the band. Once broken in, fits as a glove. Keeps excellent time. I love it so munch, I own the same in chrome too!
customer_reviews.author: Vatche

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.... face simply too big.
customer_reviews.text: Watch face was bigger than I expected.... returned and bought a Raymond Weil with a smaller face....
customer_reviews.author: charles J. Bozian

customer_reviews.title: a good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He loves it, however the band isn't as big and is somewhat tight around his wrist. Overall, a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: I love the watch and I think I will keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: Same story with the band....the band is short ... I love the watch and I think I will keep it and buy another band. Unfortunately, there are no many choices on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Thiswatch is simple
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simple, elegant, and has kept perfect time for me so far. I receive a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, short band
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, quite thin, band is a little short for a big guy, on the last hole already
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

customer_reviews.title: The watch is a beautiful Swiss quartz piece
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered very quickly and without fuss. The watch is a beautiful Swiss quartz piece. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Taro L. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Classy Swiss Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely stylish and simple Tissot dress watch. Its elegant, clear and projects sophistication. The dial is large but not thick. The rose gold body comes with a 100% genuine leather clasp like band that enhances the beauty of the watch. I just wish this watch was also offered with a black leather band option, with the same price. I own Rolex, Omega and a Longines Swiss watches. This Tissot although is not as pricey as my other Swiss watches but has its place right next to them as it depicts quality and class.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this watch bought from Amazon. It is very beatiful with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The leath wripped. and broke. I want my 2 year warranty to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived before estimates date so very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Arrived before estimates date so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic and great quality for such price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay...Classic and great quality for such price, couldn't complain any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful watch by Tissot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. The quartz movement allows you to "set it and forget it." I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sleek and slim! The keepsake I had hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Slim and sleek and the packaging was fabulous! My son loves it! It was the perfect College Graduation keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Sirkis

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i had been looking for. Well made, good colors, and thin feel. It should cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. It has been a month now
customer_reviews.text: I feared it was too big with all the comments I read on the internet, but you get used to its size very quickly. Excellent quality. It has been a month now, and no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Much too large for my wrist; returned July 23, 2016 by UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Just Magnificient !
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch with subtle boldness. The size of the dial in Rose Gold is eye catching. The neat white dial gives very exquisite look. A superb choice for connoisseurs of Time.
customer_reviews.author: vineet kaura

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Watch Bought for my 15 YO Son who thinks its great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kathagen

customer_reviews.title: Simple, nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is well packaged and 100% new. The leather part is very nice, actually its color is brown, which is not like the pic here shows.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Cai

customer_reviews.title: Tissot Tradition Rose Gold PVD Mens Watch T0636103603700
customer_reviews.text: The case is too large for me unfortunately, however, I did not want to take the chance of returning the watch, and it gets lost in the transition. I prefer a 40mm watch. I have not even worn the watch yet. Maybe it will eventually grow on me.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of buying this watch for quite a while. In the flesh its even better. Nice silver color dial. Good diameter and especially very flat so its very elegant for any formal occasion. I have to wear suits daily and this watch stands out. Comfortable. Great buy for a swiss made and brand like Tissot.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: The dial on this watch is elegant and beautiful, but the wrist band is atrocious
customer_reviews.text: The dial on this watch is elegant and beautiful, but the wrist band is atrocious. I will end up buying a replacement band, something I did not expect from a highly regarded Swiss brand such as Tissot.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Tissot Men's T0636103603700 Analog Quartz Brown Leather Strap Silver Dial Watch
product_meta.description:
Rose gold PVD stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Fixed rose gold PVD bezel. White dial with rose gold-tone hands and index hour markers. Arabic numerals mark the 6 and 12 o'clock positions. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Push / pull crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 42 mm. Case thickness: 7.74 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 21 mm. Butterfly clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Tissot Tradition Rose Gold PVD Men's Watch T0636103603700.




PRODUCT DETAILS

 * Product Dimensions :3.46 x 6.69 x 4.65 inches; 1.98 Ounces
